pages.title: A Box of Endless Possibilities
pages.text: Pandora’s Box is a powerful relic, capable of unleashing untold chaos or bestowing great fortune. Once opened, its effects are unpredictable, making it both a treasure and a curse.
A mystical artifact of unknown origins. Beware, for opening it comes with great risks and rewards.

pages.title: How to Obtain
pages.text:
Pandora’s Box cannot be crafted. It must be **summoned through a dark ritual**, requiring: 
- 1 Totem of Undying 
- 1 Soul Sand 
- 1 Nether Star 
- 1 Eclipsium Block 
- Surrounding Candles.

pages.title: Opening the Box
pages.text: Right-clicking Pandora’s Box will trigger a random event. **Be prepared!** The outcome can be either beneficial or catastrophic.

pages.title: Possible Outcomes
pages.text: - **Treasure**: Rare loot such as enchanted gear, potions, or diamonds. \n- **Chaos Spawn**: Summons waves of powerful creatures. \n- **Pandora Herself**: A small chance that Pandora, the Keeper of Chaos, emerges instead of a normal event.

pages.title: Summoning Pandora
pages.text: If Pandora herself appears, be prepared for an **epic boss battle**. She wields chaotic magic, summoning creatures and altering reality itself!

pages.title: Rewards for Defeating Pandora
pages.text:
Players who manage to defeat Pandora may receive: 
- **Pandora’s Soul** (Used to upgrade weapons with Chaos abilities) 
- **Pandora’s Contract** (Unlocks new chaotic powers when applied to a weapon) 
- **Fatebreaker** (A legendary sword that shifts between buffs and debuffs)
